rules:
    request-headers-x-prefix-oas3:
        description: Headers must start with X
        message: Headers must start with X-, so please find a new value for {{path}}.
        recommended: true
        type: style
        given: $..parameters.[?(@.in === 'header')].name
        severity: error
        resolved: false
            function: pattern
                match: ^(x|X)-
